markdown:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [How do I close my GFunds account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30844779903897-How-do-I-close-my-GFunds-account)
- [How do I update my account information in GFunds?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900005381886-How-do-I-update-my-account-information-in-GFunds)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

Closing your GFunds account is permanent and **irreversible.** Once your account is closed, you will no longer have access to any associated data or funds.

### **How to close your GFunds account:**

1. **Make sure your GFunds balance is zero** Before deleting your account, ensure that you sell any remaining funds in your GFunds account. Don’t make any new transactions until you receive your funds in your GCash Wallet.

2. **Check for Completed Transactions**

     After the [sell order processing days](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900004505746-When-will-I-receive-my-GFunds-Buy-or-Sell-orders), open your GCash app and check the Inbox to confirm your transactions.

3. **Request for Account Closure**

    Once all sell order transactions are complete and your GFunds balance is zero, [click here to ask for help](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ind=normal&tf_360023219534=ginvest__i_want_to_delete_my_ginvest_account&ticket_form_id=360000706713) to request account closure for GFunds.

### **Need more Help?**

For other inquiries or concerns, check out the following articles:

- [How do I update my account information in GFunds?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900005381886)
- [I can’t access my GFunds account. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30845136114201)
- [I can’t buy or sell in GFunds. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/35735707460505-I-cannot-buy-or-sell-in-GFunds)
- [What investment products are available on GFunds?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/5951847409049)
